scripts.compile:prod: yarn lint && yarn test && rimraf dist && webpack
scripts.package:prod:linux: cross-var "electron-packager . \"Business Modeler Hub Preview\" --out=out --platform=linux --arch=x64 --overwrite --icon=./build/icon.icns --ignore=\"^/node_modules|^/out|^/src|^/static|^/README|^/LICENSE|^/tsconfig.json|^/webpack.config.js|^/yarn-error.log\" && cp README out/Business\ Modeler\ Hub\ Preview-linux-x64/ && (cd out && tar -pcvzf Business\ Modeler\ Hub\ Preview-linux-x64.tar.gz Business\ Modeler\ Hub\ Preview-linux-x64/)"
scripts.package:prod:darwin: cross-var "electron-packager . \"Business Modeler Hub Preview\" --out=out --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --overwrite --icon=./build/icon.icns --ignore=\"^/node_modules|^/out|^/src|^/static|^/README|^/LICENSE|^/tsconfig.json|^/webpack.config.js|^/yarn-error.log\" && cp README out/Business\ Modeler\ Hub\ Preview-darwin-x64/ && (cd out && zip -qry \"Business Modeler Hub Preview-darwin-x64.zip\" \"Business Modeler Hub Preview-darwin-x64\")"
scripts.package:prod:win32: cross-var "electron-packager . \"Business Modeler Hub Preview\" --out=out --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --overwrite --icon=./build/icon.ico --ignore=\"/node_modules\" --ignore=\"/out\" --ignore=\"/src\" --ignore=\"/static\" --ignore=\"/README\" --ignore=\"/LICENSE\" --ignore=\"/tsconfig.json\" --ignore=\"/webpack.config.js\" --ignore=\"/yarn-error.log\" && copy README \"out\Business Modeler Hub Preview-win32-x64/\""
scripts.build:prod:linux: yarn run clean:prod && yarn run compile:prod && yarn run package:prod:linux
scripts.build:prod:darwin: yarn run clean:prod && yarn run compile:prod && yarn run package:prod:darwin
scripts.build:prod:win32: yarn run clean:prod && yarn run compile:prod && yarn run package:prod:win32
scripts.build:prod:all: yarn run clean:prod && yarn run compile:prod && yarn run package:prod:linux && yarn run package:prod:darwin && yarn run package:prod:win32
